Reviews.Title: “Berlin character & in good location for subway”
Reviews.Author: Norwich_UK_John
Reviews.Content: characterful clean inexpensive 200 yards nearest subway station dont stay prefer sterile multi national chain hotels stayed nights enjoyed hotel quiet beds comfortable breakfast normal basic european effort money excellent public transport system fantastic hotel extremely close subway stations wait five minutes train change youre heart berlin twenty minutes buy welcome cards easy cheap travel

Reviews.Title: “My worst hotel experience in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: silkroadmedia
Reviews.Content: eight visiting itb unlucky book hotel overcharged 30 euro beginning website accept card payment cash payment cost additional time foreign withdrawal bank charges talking utilities tv remote shower properly phone wifi hotel internet breakfast poor hot food staff useless poor english stay russian owner similar hotels berlin afraid
